name: WhiteHedge Technologies

overview:
WhiteHedge Technologies, an ISO 9001:2008 certified company, is an end-to-end software services and solutions provider. With its business and operations spread across US, Europe and India; WhiteHedge provides Software and Business Services to its global client base. WhiteHedge has a team of professionals with expert level experience in various technological and functional domain areas. It offers various engagement models to get engaged with the clients to deliver better business value proposition.

By understating the technology at it’s core combined with Industry knowledge and Project Management expertise, WhiteHedge brings core value to our clients. WhiteHedge specializes in bringing an objective eye to every engagement.

Our Methodology

We have proven processes derived from industry recognized standards like Six-Sigma, Rational Unified Process, Prince 2 and our experience for defining, managing requirements, managing requirement changes, managing development, delivery and so on. Our processes are big enabler for meeting client requirements ‘On Time In Budget’.
